channel.title: Before you post!
channel.description:
Before you post in this forum you should check:- 1 - Make sure your in the right forum, by reading the discription of each forum as shown below
[img]http://img304.imageshack.us/img304/8454/moparmakesurepic1wi9.png[/img]
2 - To make sure that your question hasn't already been answered by using proberbly one of the most best kept secret of the moparisthebest.com/smf the search button [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search[/url]
3 - Make sure your question has enought detail / information so others can give you the correct answer to your Question
4 - This site [blue]moparisthebest.com/smf[/blue] will not be held responsible for any incorrect answers that you may be given
Good Luck With All Your Homework.
i believe this should be a sticky..
